title: Attack, Decay, Sustain & Release
body: ADSR is an acronym that represents the four parts of a sound's envelope

sections.title: Attack
sections.text: Attack is the time taken for initial run-up of level from nil to peak, beginning when the key is pressed.

sections.title: Decay
sections.text: Decay is the time taken for the subsequent run down from the attack level to the designated sustain level.

sections.title: Sustain
sections.text: Sustain is the level during the main sequence of the sound's duration, until the key is released.

sections.title: Release
sections.text: Release is the time taken for the level to decay from the sustain level to zero
